titles: The mounument of Charles the First, King of England VVho was beheaded before Whit-Hall [sic] January 30th 1648. In the 24th yeare of his reigne.
notes: Verse - "Here lyes great Charles, first King of that same name,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Charles --  I, --  King of England, 1600-1649 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
